meanings.definition: National Security Council System (米国の国家安全保障会議システム)
meanings.english_definition: An inter-agency body of the U.S. government, falling within the Executive Office of the President, that advises the President on matters of national security and foreign policy.

examples.sentence: The NSCS coordinates policy among various government agencies.
examples.translation: NSCSは様々な政府機関間の政策を調整する。

etymology.value: Acronym for National Security Council System.
